name: Papyrus (HairyTea)
description:
=-= Papyrus =-=

This game was made in Unity for a College project about level design. We had to create a Metroidvania style game.

Papyrus was made with speed running in mind. Adding a timer added this feeling along with replay-ability to the game

The goal of the game is to collect the 2 magical sphere items to open the doors.  Fastest time gets bragging rights.

Music - https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/hip-jazz

Font - https://www.dafont.com/paper-johnny.font

Assets - https://v3x3d.itch.io/paper-pixels
